insert into js_sys_member (serial_number, account_number, organ_name, organ_class, member_grade, member_createtime, member_overtime, organ_address, detail_address, organ_phone, organ_man, organ_manphone, organ_hava, reserve_field1, reserve_dield2, match_update, match_onedate, match_longitude, match_latitude, clue_count, ai_times, user_code, up_isEffective)

mapper.update:
update js_sys_member
account_number = #{accountNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
organ_name = #{organName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
organ_class = #{organClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
member_grade = #{memberGrade,jdbcType=CHAR},
member_createtime = #{memberCreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
member_overtime = #{memberOvertime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
organ_address = #{organAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
detail_address = #{detailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
organ_phone = #{organPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
organ_man = #{organMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
organ_manphone = #{organManphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
organ_hava = #{organHava,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reserve_field1 = #{reserveField1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reserve_dield2 = #{reserveDield2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
match_update = #{matchUpdate,jdbcType=DATE},
match_onedate = #{matchOnedate,jdbcType=DATE},
match_longitude = #{matchLongitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
match_latitude = #{matchLatitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
clue_count = #{clueCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ai_times = #{aiTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_code = #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
up_isEffective = #{upIseffective,jdbcType=CHAR},
where serial_number = #{serialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update js_sys_member set account_number = #{accountNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, organ_name = #{organName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, organ_class = #{organClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_grade = #{memberGrade,jdbcType=CHAR}, member_createtime = #{memberCreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, member_overtime = #{memberOvertime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, organ_address = #{organAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, detail_address = #{detailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, organ_phone = #{organPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, organ_man = #{organMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, organ_manphone = #{organManphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, organ_hava = #{organHava,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reserve_field1 = #{reserveField1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reserve_dield2 = #{reserveDield2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, match_update = #{matchUpdate,jdbcType=DATE}, match_onedate = #{matchOnedate,jdbcType=DATE}, match_longitude = #{matchLongitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, match_latitude = #{matchLatitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, clue_count = #{clueCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ai_times = #{aiTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_code = #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, up_isEffective = #{upIseffective,jdbcType=CHAR} where serial_number = #{serialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from js_sys_member where 1=1
and DATE(member_overtime) >= DATE(#{startTime})
and DATE(member_overtime) <= DATE(#{endTime})
and organ_name like '%${organName}%'
and member_grade = #{memberGrade}

select
from js_sys_member where member_grade > 0 and up_isEffective = '1'
select organ_class from js_sys_member where user_code = #{loginCode}

select
from js_sys_member where match_longitude = "" || match_longitude is null
SELECT COUNT(*) from js_sys_member where DATE_FORMAT(member_createtime, '%Y-%m')=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m');
SELECT COUNT(*) from up_clue where DATE_FORMAT(up_clue_time, '%Y-%m')=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m');
